name: Filler 0
description:
Filler 0 is a game where you must make a path for Paintballs to reach a goal. Filler 0 was made for Clickteam's 30 Minutes Game Creation Video Contest.

Controls:

Mouse: Move Cursor
Left Mouse Button: Move Shapes
Right Mouse Button: Rotate Shapes

Whole Development Video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oJWAta-8PCs

I hope you enjoy Filler 0 and I hope you look forward to my future games and don't forget to comment and review! Also if you like Filler 0, Filler 1 is in development and is coming soon!
